title: Research Beads JSONL format
description: Document Beads schema, field mappings to Taskulus, what gets lost. Design migration strategy.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

custom.beads_notes:
Plan: inspect local .beads JSONL schema and document fields relevant for migration; record findings and close.
Inspected .beads/issues.jsonl schema. Top-level fields observed: id, title, description, status, priority, issue_type, owner, assignee, created_at, created_by, updated_at, closed_at, close_reason, notes, acceptance_criteria, dependencies, comments. dependencies[] objects: issue_id, depends_on_id, type, created_at, created_by. comments[] objects: id, issue_id, author, text, created_at. Timestamp formats: issue created_at/updated_at include offset (e.g., 2026-02-10T23:20:19.698014-05:00); comment created_at uses Z (UTC). .beads/metadata.json maps database and jsonl_export; interactions.jsonl currently empty.
custom.beads_close_reason: Documented Beads JSONL fields, dependency/comment schemas, and timestamp formats from .beads/issues.jsonl.
